      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: TrackerClient
        Close any opened announce connection.

        This method is called by Client.stop() to make sure all connections are correctly closed when the announce thread is asked to stop.

        Overrides:
        stop in class TrackerClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • announce

        public void announce(AnnounceResponseListener listener,
            TorrentMetadataProvider torrent,
            java.net.URI tracker,
            TrackerMessage.AnnounceEvent event,
            boolean inhibitEvents)
              throws AnnounceException
        Build, send and process a tracker announce request.

        This function first builds an announce request for the specified event with all the required parameters. Then, the request is made to the tracker and the response analyzed.

        All registered AnnounceResponseListener objects are then fired with the decoded payload.

        Specified by:
        announce in class TrackerClient
        Parameters:
        event - The announce event type (can be AnnounceEvent.NONE for periodic updates).
        inhibitEvents - Prevent event listeners from being notified.
        Throws:
        AnnounceException
